Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Speaker A's youngest son is addicted to social media and video games. Speaker B's younger son loves Chinese food, and both speakers plan to have a surprise party for their sons who are turning thirteen. Speaker B also suspects his younger son might be secretly gay. Speaker A and Speaker B enjoy ice skating together.
